name: Kinesis
intro: Decentralized Automated Market Maker (AMM) on EVMOS Blockchain
introduce: Kinesis is a decentralized automated market maker (AMM) on the EVMOS blockchain, optimized for trading pegged value crypto assets with minimal slippage such as stablecoins. Through Kinesis, all traders can swap their desired stablecoins between EVM compatible blockchains and Cosmos chains.
